title: Draft an Abstract for a Scientific Publication
description: A medical writer needs to draft an abstract summarizing the results of a clinical study for submission to a journal.

tasks.description: Review the clinical study report (CSR) to understand the key findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the primary and key secondary endpoint results from the CSR.

tasks.description: Draft the abstract following the standard IMRAD (Introduction, Methods, Results, and Discussion) structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a draft abstract that correctly follows the IMRAD format.

tasks.description: Ensure the abstract adheres to the word count limit of the target journal (e.g., 250 words).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent edits the abstract to meet the length requirement without losing key information.

tasks.description: Route the draft abstract for internal review and approval before submission.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the draft to the study authors for their review and approval.
